FuncDef:
The cache-sa-disable command disables the source active (SA) cache function.
The undo cache-sa-disable command enables the SA cache function on a router, allowing the router to cache (S, G) information carried in received SA messages.
The SA cache function is enabled on a router. The cache-sa-disable command disables the source active (SA) cache function. The undo cache-sa-disable command enables the SA cache function on a router, allowing the router to cache (S, G) information carried in received SA messages. The SA cache function is enabled on a router. By default, the SA cache function is enabled on a Router.
ParentView: VPN instance MSDP view,MSDP view of a public network instance
